XGpioPs Struct Reference

#include <xgpiops.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

XGpioPs_Config GpioConfig
u32 IsReady
XGpioPs_Handler Handler
void * CallBackRef

Detailed Description

The XGpioPs driver instance data. The user is required to allocate a variable of this type for the GPIO device in the system. A pointer to a variable of this type is then passed to the driver API functions.

Member Data Documentation

Callback ref for bank handlers
